html: We're extremely excited to share a very moving short film from @MediCinema and @vuecinemas. Simon met one of the charity's incredible patients Sienna to raise awareness of how MediCinema helps. The film is now screening at Vue across the UK. #FeelBetterwithFilmpic.twitter.com/u3gNoLEInI
